text_duplicated_verify_quest: Do you use a friend or family's Twitter account?
text_duplicated_verify_reason: Because this Twitter account has associated with another Discord account.
text_failed_to_verify_message: Oops! It seems that the following supporting documents are still missing? Hurry back and prepare, the expedition will not be waiting for overtime!
text_follow_the_steps_to_re_verify: Please follow the steps below to reverify:
text_modal_content_back_to_discord: You are about to return to Mindtrix Discord.
text_modal_content_successfully_connect_: All done! It's time to nominate your favorite podcasters in Mindtrix Discord.
text_reenter_mindtrix_discord_to_re_veri: Re-enter Mindtrix Discord to start the verification process
text_retweet_mindtrix_pinned_post_on_twi: Retweet pinned post on Mindtrix Twitter
text_sign_in_your_twitter: Sign in to your own Twitter account
text_sign_out_current_twitter: Log out of your current Twitter account.
text_successful_verified_message: Congratulations! You have qualified and will get an NFT for proof of participation. Connect your blockchain wallet, and Team Mindtrix will send it to your wallet address before the end of the campaign. Stay tuned for rewards notifications in Discord.
